compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/Applications/MAMP/htdocs/MasterG/node-e.serviceRawFile:
service: master-g-api

frameworkVersion: '4'

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  stage: ${opt:stage, 'dev'}
  region: ${opt:region, 'ap-south-1'}
  memorySize: 128
  logRetentionInDays: 1

functions:
  getTasks:
    handler: src/handlers/getTask.handler
    events:
      - httpApi:
          path: /tasks
          method: get

  createTask:
    handler: src/handlers/createTask.handler
    events:
      - httpApi:
          path: /tasks
          method: post

  updateTask:
    handler: src/handlers/updateTask.handler
    events:
      - httpApi:
          path: /tasks/{id}
          method: put

plugins:
  - serverless-offline

compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
